## Source: ossf-package-analysis (190845a762334a5ed99d67986a803d15af723991a1dd90af98f6be280284aa02)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'matplotlib-requests' @ 16.12.4 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
